p.strong: WHAT SHOULD BE CONTAINED IN A PR

li.p: PRs should be specific — aimed toward a single user story and not contain multiple unrelated changes.
Exceptions would be when refactoring, but even refactors should have some order.
PR should have an attached Work Item.

body.h3: HOW TO ENSURE WE HAVE REVIEWERS FOR PR

li.p: As a minimum, two reviewers are required for a PR.
To ensure all PRs are addressed, we should implement a rotation system.
